title: Taken by the Sun God: Or, how sex with Apollo saved me from a terrible vampire death
description: What happens when a vampire accidentally exposes herself to sunlight? Can the sun god, Apollo, save her from destruction, and what will he expect in return? Reading this poignant, erotic short story, you'll laugh, you'll cry, and you'll shiver with juicy excitement.Intended for mature audiences 18+ only. Contains explicit descriptions of sexual acts, vampire trivia, crypto-erotica, and historical mead references. This book is 2,102 words long, and deeply moving. Or arousing. Or both.
author: Maddie Montrose
